abstract: Report by Concussion Legacy Foundation points out that poorly maintained playing surfaces, especially artificial ones, contribute to risk of head injuries in football; urges schools, cities and teams, which are increasingly installing synthetic turf as way to reduce maintenance costs, to treat fields as they do other protective sports equipment.
lead_paragraph: The Concussion Legacy Foundation called attention to the link between head injuries and poorly maintained fields, especially those of synthetic turf.

headline.print_headline: Concussion Report Calls Attention to Fields
